ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: You missed the point entirely.  The point is the song has its uses.  To say that Clouding replaces Concord is plain stupid.  Both songs have their uses in the
ygData.messageBody:
You missed the point entirely. The point is the song has its uses. To say
that Clouding replaces Concord is plain stupid. Both songs have their uses
in the right time and place. Not every song is going to a must play song.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 9:56 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


At 07:47 AM 2/27/01 -0800, you wrote:
>*sigh* Did Kenross get sold on ebay? To say that the needed change to the
>lvl 19 song (adding see invis) made the lvl 24 song pointless is about the
>stupidest thing I have read on this or any list. Next time you need to
see
>invis with a pet caster around see how much they enjoy recasting their pet
>when you pulse clouding to see invis. Or maybe when you are fighting invis
>mobs in PoA or another zone and have to use your flute so your party can
see
>the invis mob you are fighting.

you mean rather than having them cast see invis on you? is it really worth
it on
a PoA raid to have you waste a song slot and played song with lvl 24 song
rather
than getting one of probably 20 or so casters to cast see invis on you?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
